content: Retirement Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Asked by AnonymousAsked on 16 Sep 2019Is there any fall-below fee for the SRS account if I decide to open it with $1 just to lock the age of penalty-free withdrawal at 62yo?If so, is there any ways to work around it?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 16 Sep 2019Nope, no fall-below fees. :) You can keep that $1 throughout.1 comment4
